name: Ace of Hearts (Saimai, flymozzarella, blurayd1sc, emiree)
name_original: Ace of Hearts (Saimai, flymozzarella, blurayd1sc, emiree)
description:
This is a game about NOT dating people! Focus on your grades and your studies but whatever you do DON'T get distracted by the five potential love interests.

*Note: this is a demo, not the full game. Updates to come

CREDITS:

Programming- Sammy Lesner, Emily Choi

Character art- Emily Hang

Background Art- Emily Choi

Other Sprites (ft. cat) - Emily Choi

Music- Gbrl++ (ON YOUTUBE)

Scripting - Jessica Martinez, Sammy Lesner
